original_text: That thou turnest thy spirit against God, and lettest such words go out of thy mouth?
korean_text: 네 영이 하나님께 분노를 터뜨리며 네 입을 놀리느냐

sentences.original_text: That thou turnest thy spirit against God
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 영을 하나님을 거슬러 돌리니

sentences.original_text: and lettest such words go out of thy mouth?
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 말이 네 입에서 나오게 하느냐?
